BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_keywords: event venues, event planning, events in Australia, MICE in Australia, business in Australia, conventions, congresses, association events in Australia, news, itineraries, convention centres, medical congreses, case studies
BEBaseFoundation.stf_meta_description: Find information about holding your association event in Australia. Itineraries, case studies, images and other helpful tools for association executives.

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Australia has all the resources that associations need to stage a successful event. Our convention bureaux offer complimentary support, including identifying the best location for your event, accessing government and industry support, maximising delegate numbers and ensuring everything runs smoothly, from visas to partner programs.

We recommend you contact:

Australia Association Project Manager
Julie Sheather
T: +61 417 885 215
E : associations@tourism.australia.com
W: businessevents.australia.com
